link_mentions.page: The A-Z Guide to Arranged Marriage
response: The A-Z Guide to Arranged Marriage is a 2005 romantic comedy novel written by Rekha Waheed about a single Asian woman looking to settle using old traditions and new world savvy.
Saris and the City is a 2010 romantic novel written by Rekha Waheed about a career-driven woman looking for a suitable husband.

Jaya Bhattacharji Rose of Friends Of Books blog said, "Saris and the City is breezy, chatty and pure fun to read..." Nicky Cole of TheBookbag.co.uk said, "Overall, I found this book highly readable and enjoyed my first experience of Rekha Waheed's writing."
My Bollywood Wedding is a 2010 romantic comedy novel written by Rekha Waheed about a British Asian women's attempt to plan the perfect wedding.
